abstract: Mr. Gilligan, the creator and show runner of "Breaking Bad," discusses the behind-the-scenes negotiations to extend the series and why its season finale was almost its series finale.
snippet: Mr. Gilligan, the creator and show runner of "Breaking Bad," discusses the behind-the-scenes negotiations to extend the series and why its season finale was almost its series finale.

headline.main: Vince Gilligan of 'Breaking Bad' Talks About Ending the Season, and the Series
